summary: Color Scheme resembling the Komodo Dark theme
name: dragon
description:
Recommended: Improved JS support http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1491

Tweaked highlighting for PHP, JS, HTML, CSS.

Used the wombat color scheme as the starting point.
install_details: Put the script into your Vim 'colors' directory (e.g. ~/.vim/colors), and load it with the command :colorscheme dragon
